title: The Biosphere
creator_credit: William Pettigrew, Colin Low, Peter Katadotis, Barrie Howells and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: The McKenzie and Amazon Valleys are 10,000 kilometres distant from one another and are certainly distinct ecologically. Yet in a subtle sense they are collaborating elements within the biosphere - the Earth’s thin layer of living matter. This film examines two of the myriad river ecosystems and shows how they are linked within the biosphere.
